SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI

Class TUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.ClientView
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI.TUI
public class TUI extends ClientView
This class represents the Text User Interface (TUI) of the application. It extends the ClientView class and implements the necessary methods for the TUI.
